item.description:
Ann Chuk, one of our members, holds an annual fundraising event at her barn in Woodstock, CT.
Let's get together and support her efforts and have a wonderful time to boot! Entertainment, artisans and craft vendors have been lined up by Ann. This is an all day event. Drop in when you'd like or watch the discussion for this meetup and plan accordingly.

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: Artists in the Country
